content:
I would like a review of #14069, which fixes all the places in Mathlib where the right hand side of a declaration affects the universes chosen in the type signature! (Ouch!)

We will probably in future prevent this from happening at all.
Thanks @Sébastien Gouëzel and @Yaël Dillies for reviews, I've mark it back as awaiting-review.

Separately, @Yaël Dillies, if you are going to post "Looking" in PR threads, could you either also post "Finished", or at least some emoji? I think your current practice can easily induce others to not look, thereby slowing down the review process.

Sure yeah. Right now it means "I have opened a tab for it, which I will clear before I next look at my notifications" but it's not a great indicator of how quickly I am going to get to it... In fact, it's more of an indicator that I won't get to it quickly since otherwise I won't have sending "Looking" in the first place.
In that case, I don't think you need to say anything.
Yeah I have the same workflow and say nothing :-)
